| Mayor Cummerbund:* can [swim](/wiki/Swim "Swim").
* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is a [human](/wiki/Human_\(monster_attribute\) "Human (monster attribute)").
* is a [lord to its kind](/wiki/M2_LORD "M2 LORD").
* is male.
* is normally generated [peaceful](/wiki/Peaceful "Peaceful").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* [likes gold](/wiki/Gold_lover "Gold lover").
* likes gems.
* can pick up weapons and food.
* can pick up [magical items](/wiki/Magical_item "Magical item").
* lets you close unless attacked.
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* cannot be [tamed](/wiki/Scroll_of_taming "Scroll of taming"). |                                          |

**Mayor Cummerbund**, @, is the [Pirate](/wiki/Pirate "Pirate") [quest leader](/wiki/Quest_leader "Quest leader") in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"), and [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"). He possesses two weapon attacks, and has [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance") and the ability to [swim](/wiki/Swim "Swim").

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Generation](#Generation)
- [2 Origin](#Origin)
- [3 Encyclopedia entry](#Encyclopedia_entry)
- [4 References](#References)

## Generation

Mayor Cummerbund is [always generated with](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory") a [leather cloak](/wiki/Leather_cloak "Leather cloak"), [high boots](/wiki/High_boots "High boots") and [leather gloves](/wiki/Leather_gloves "Leather gloves"). He also has a 1⁄3 chance of generating with a [rustproof](/wiki/Rustproof "Rustproof") [cutlass](/wiki/Cutlass "Cutlass"), an independent 1⁄3 chance of generating with a [fireproof](/wiki/Fireproof "Fireproof") [leather jacket](/wiki/Leather_jacket "Leather jacket"), and an independent 2⁄3 chance of generating with a [fireproof](/wiki/Fireproof "Fireproof") [buckler](/wiki/Buckler "Buckler").

## Origin

[![Wikipedia](/images/thumb/f/f8/Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png/50px-Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png)](/wiki/File:Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png "Wikipedia")

[Wikipedia](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page "wikipedia:Main Page") has an article about:

***[Dread Pirate Roberts](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dread_Pirate_Roberts "wikipedia:Dread Pirate Roberts")***

"Cummerbund" is mentioned in the in-game encyclopedia entry for "Dread Pirate Roberts" as the given name of one of several pirates who formerly held the title of "Dread Pirate Roberts" in the book/film *The Princess Bride*, so it is likely that the "Mayor Cummerbund" the player meets represents the same individual.

It is not clear if the quest is meant to take place before, after, or during Cummerbund's tenure as Dread Pirate Roberts, but in light of the tone of the encyclopedia entry chosen for him, it seems likely that it takes place after he has retired from full-time piracy to become leader of the pirate community on Tortuga.

## Encyclopedia entry

Mine was a name that struck fear into men  
And regret into plenty of lasses  
Oh, how I wish I could take back those days  
As I stare at these empty beer-glasses  
  
I think of the times past when I had it all  
I toyed with men's wives and their daughters  
And in my pursuit of this ill-gotten wealth  
I stabbed and I slashed and I slaughtered.  
  
And for what?  
The men that I've fought  
Are matched by the number of women I've bought  
And for what?  
I've killed and I've shot  
And reddened the cold tears of children with blood  
And If I could go back and make my amends  
I'd make all those mistakes again  
I'd kill every last one of those bastards, my friend

\[ Pirate Song, Alestorm ]

## References

Reference: [Chris's Pirate Patch](https://github.com/Chris-plus-alphanumericgibberish/NetHack/compare/master...Chris_s_Pirate_Patch.diff)

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")

Mayor Cummerbund

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
@ Mayor Cummerbund
Difficulty 22
Attacks Weapon 2d8 physical, Weapon 2d8 physical
@ Mayor Cummerbund
Difficulty 22
Attacks

Weapon 2d8 physical, Weapon 2d8 physical

Base level 20
Base experience 661
Speed 8
Base AC 8
Base MR 70
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size medium
Resistances poison

Mayor Cummerbund:

  • can swim.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a human.
  • is a lord to its kind.
  • is male.
  • is normally generated peaceful.
  • is strong.
  • likes gold.
  • likes gems.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • lets you close unless attacked.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • cannot be tamed.

Mayor Cummerbund, @, is the Pirate quest leader in dNetHack, notdNetHack, and SlashTHEM. He possesses two weapon attacks, and has poison resistance and the ability to swim.

Contents

  • 1 Generation
  • 2 Origin
  • 3 Encyclopedia entry
  • 4 References

Generation

Mayor Cummerbund is always generated with a leather cloak, high boots and leather gloves. He also has a 1⁄3 chance of generating with a rustproof cutlass, an independent 1⁄3 chance of generating with a fireproof leather jacket, and an independent 2⁄3 chance of generating with a fireproof buckler.

Origin

Wikipedia has an article about:
Dread Pirate Roberts

"Cummerbund" is mentioned in the in-game encyclopedia entry for "Dread Pirate Roberts" as the given name of one of several pirates who formerly held the title of "Dread Pirate Roberts" in the book/film The Princess Bride, so it is likely that the "Mayor Cummerbund" the player meets represents the same individual.

It is not clear if the quest is meant to take place before, after, or during Cummerbund's tenure as Dread Pirate Roberts, but in light of the tone of the encyclopedia entry chosen for him, it seems likely that it takes place after he has retired from full-time piracy to become leader of the pirate community on Tortuga.

Encyclopedia entry

Mine was a name that struck fear into men
And regret into plenty of lasses
Oh, how I wish I could take back those days
As I stare at these empty beer-glasses

I think of the times past when I had it all
I toyed with men's wives and their daughters
And in my pursuit of this ill-gotten wealth
I stabbed and I slashed and I slaughtered.

And for what?
The men that I've fought
Are matched by the number of women I've bought
And for what?
I've killed and I've shot
And reddened the cold tears of children with blood
And If I could go back and make my amends
I'd make all those mistakes again
I'd kill every last one of those bastards, my friend

[ Pirate Song, Alestorm ]

References

Reference: Chris's Pirate Patch

==Generation==
Mayor Cummerbund is [[Monster starting inventory|always generated with]] a [[leather cloak]], [[high boots]] and [[leather gloves]]. He also has a {{frac|3}} chance of generating with a [[rustproof]] [[cutlass]], an independent {{frac|3}} chance of generating with a [[fireproof]] [[leather jacket]], and an independent {{frac|2|3}} chance of generating with a [[fireproof]] [[buckler]].

==Origin==
{{Wikipedia|Dread Pirate Roberts}}
"Cummerbund" is mentioned in the in-game encyclopedia entry for "Dread Pirate Roberts" as the given name of one of several pirates who formerly held the title of "Dread Pirate Roberts" in the book/film ''The Princess Bride'', so it is likely that the "Mayor Cummerbund" the player meets represents the same individual. 

It is not clear if the quest is meant to take place before, after, or during Cummerbund's tenure as Dread Pirate Roberts, but in light of the tone of the encyclopedia entry chosen for him, it seems likely that it takes place after he has retired from full-time piracy to become leader of the pirate community on Tortuga.
